page.title: 06OCCUPATIONS IN OLDBURY
page.content: Quite a lot of people in Oldbury on Severn work on the farms in the area. Some are self-employed builders and a few work in the Power Station. Most of the other villagers have to leave the village to go to work. Some people still work at the old crafts but these are just hobbies rather than full time jobs. These include cider making, basket weaving and putcher making. Putchers are used for trapping Severn salmon. The only other jobs are part-time jobs at the two pubs, egg farm and the Water Board.
